WebLink.description: Opens the file explorer for any Salesforce record.
WebLink.url: {!URLFOR("/apex/NEILON__edHome", null, ['folderIdForRoot'=IF(NEILON__Folder__c.Id != null, NEILON__Folder__c.Id, ''),'parentId'=IF(Lead.Id != null, Lead.Id, IF(Opportunity.Id != null, Opportunity.Id, IF( Case.Id != null, Case.Id, IF(Asset.Id != null, Asset.Id, IF(Campaign.Id != null, Campaign.Id, IF(Contract.Id != null, Contract.Id, IF(Product2.Id != null, Product2.Id, IF(Solution.Id != null, Solution.Id, IF(Contact.Id != null, Contact.Id, IF(Account.Id != null, Account.Id, null))))))))))])}
